## Utils.ValidationHelpers class

A collection of validation and normalization helpers for constrained string types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ValidationHelpers<T extends string, TC = unknown> 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(init)](./ts-bcp47.utils.validationhelpers._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs new [validation helpers](./ts-bcp47.utils.validationhelpers.md) from supplied initializers. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [converter](./ts-bcp47.utils.validationhelpers.converter.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Converter&lt;T, TC&gt; | A <code>Convereter</code> which converts <code>unknown</code> to the tag type validated by these helpers, if possible. |
|  [description](./ts-bcp47.utils.validationhelpers.description.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string | Describes the group of tags validated by these helpers. |
|  [isCanonical](./ts-bcp47.utils.validationhelpers.iscanonical.md) | <code>readonly</code> | TypeGuardWithContext&lt;T, TC&gt; | Determines is a supplied tag is well-formed and uses canonical formatting, according to the lexical rules defined for the tag validated by these helpers. |
|  [isWellFormed](./ts-bcp47.utils.validationhelpers.iswellformed.md) | <code>readonly</code> | TypeGuardWithContext&lt;T, TC&gt; | Determines is a supplied tag is well-formed according to the lexical rules defined for the tag validated by these helpers. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [toCanonical(from, context)](./ts-bcp47.utils.validationhelpers.tocanonical.md) |  | Converts a supplied <code>unknown</code> to the canonical form of the tag validated by these helpers. |
|  [verifyIsCanonical(from, context)](./ts-bcp47.utils.validationhelpers.verifyiscanonical.md) |  | Determints if a supplied <code>unknown</code> is a well-formed, canonical representation of the tag validated by these helpers. |
|  [verifyIsWellFormed(from, context)](./ts-bcp47.utils.validationhelpers.verifyiswellformed.md) |  | Determints if a supplied <code>unknown</code> is a well-formed representation of the tag validated by these helpers. |
